short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copilot is your personal Swiss-knife for dating apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey mate! Are you...
❓ Tired of being ghosted?
❓ Bored with shallow chats?
❓ Struggling to articulate your messages?

I feel you! I've been there... and I decided to build a tool. And I want you to be part of it!

What will YOU get?
🤖 AI-powered chat assistance (knows about your match)
😱 Your own Botly Prompts (forget writer's block)
✍️ Write better messages
📝 Private chat notes
🔗 Shareable chat links (no more screenshot hassles!)
📊 Texting pattern insights (inside the text app)
🔒 Tracker blocking & support for your own API keys
🚧 In active & passionate development (your ideas are wanted!)


Ready to transform your experience? Let's do this! 🎉

Is your data safe? 🏰
Absolutely! It's encrypted at rest, not sold, and only shared with AI when you use those features. 

Legal stuff: 🎓
- This extension isn't affiliated with or endorsed by any dating platforms or AI service providers. In fact, with no one.
- It's like adding sparkle to your favourite drink – use it to enhance your experience, but remember, you're the bartender of your dating journey! 
- The use of this extension indemnifies the creator from any liability.
- By signing up, you're agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Please check it out.


----
For all fiverr/upwork unsolicited emails:
- I am not interest in fake promotion or reviews so please don't send. All such emails go to spam.
- Saying you can give dozens of installs in a day is plain arrogant and distasteful. That is so fake, and we don't do that here.
